title: recipes_Onion_Roasted_Sweet_Potatoes
text:
Title: Onion Roasted Sweet Potatoes.
.
Description: This savory onion-roasted sweet potato recipe is super easy to make with just three ingredients: sweet potatoes, oil, and onion soup mix..
.
Ingredients:.
- 2 pounds sweet potatoes, peeled and diced.
- 0.33333298563957 cup vegetable oil.
- 2 (1 ounce) packages dry onion soup mix.
.
Instructions:.
- Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)..
- Place sweet potatoes, oil, and onion soup mix in a large bowl; toss until sweet potatoes are well coated. Spread sweet potatoes on a large baking sheet..
- Bake in the preheated oven until sweet potatoes are tender, about 40 to 50 minutes..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 197 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 27 g.
fiberContent: 4 g.
proteinContent: 2 g.
saturatedFatContent: 1 g.
sodiumContent: 681 mg.
sugarContent: 5 g.
fatContent: 9 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 8 servings.
